summary: Known as Chopper 1 in U.S. A good paced vertical scrolling helicopter shoot 'em up. Enemies include choppers, tanks and boats. The usual sort of power ups are available, better weapons, smartbombs etc... Playing with the perspective there are also ground based obstacles that rise up giving you extra hazards to avoid.

name: Kong's Wrath: City of Mayhem

summary:
This edition includes the following:

- KonoSuba: God’s Blessing on this Wonderful World! Love for this Tempting Attire
- Megumin SD Character Figure
- OST CD

name: KooZac
summary: "Tetris meets Sudoku", that's how Square Enix describes this puzzle game.

name: Konung 2: Blood of Titans
summary:
Konung 2 is a sequel to Konung: The Legend of North. According to the storyline Good and Evil traded places. The main hero that won a victory over the forces of Evil in the first part of the game has got under the influence of a very powerful magic artifact -- Sovereign bracelet. The hero became the dark Master, the biggest threat for his land. His mind is completely controlled by the bracelet and he is trying to subdue all other magic artefacts.

Only six heroes, descendants of the Titans, can stop him. They must be fearless and very cautious. Their enemies are not only bloodthirsty monsters but Master's warriors as well. Their task is hard but it's the only way to save their land.

The world of Konung is a unique and spacious fantasy land, that combines parts of known history with classical myths and the legends of the Chronicles, including immortal heroes, magical artefacts and ancient sorcery. The whole world is shaped by three cultures on the verge of the second millennium: tribes of wild Slavic hunters, noble traders of the still-powerful Byzantine Empire, and fearless Viking warriors.

name: Kochonland
summary: A French browser-based game where you have to buy and raise a pig in a farm.

name: Kono Aozora ni Yakusoku wo: Refine
summary: An upcoming remake of Kono Aozora ni Yakusoku wo for PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

name: Koi x Mitsu: Yaeneri Saki to Akai Ito no Ouji-sama
Koongya Draw Party
summary: New drawing quiz game “Koongya Draw Party” coming soon!

name: Kosmo Spin
summary: Kosmo Spin is a game by Simogo that appears on iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch. The main character is Nod and the player must help him protect his breakfast from a UFO.

name: Kokurase: Episode 1
summary: The Kokurase gang, also known as Cupid’s Helpers, is out to help freshman Sakura woo Yoshimitsu, a popular senior with every other girl in school vying for his heart. Switch between members to bring these two lovebirds together in an intertwining tale.

name: Koi Puncher MMXVIII
summary: Unlimited koi. Unlimited punching.

name: Koza
summary: Run for your life

name: Kogasa's Lunar Fright Mission
summary: Kogasa is going to do the biggest spook of all time!

name: Kontrakt

name: Kokoda VR
summary: Experience the Kokoda story as you’ve never seen it before - in stunningly detailed, 360-degree Virtual Reality.

name: Koi Suru Otome to Shugo no Tate: Re:boot the "Shield-9" - Adult Version
Koino no Kokoro Ikusei Game
summary: Koino no Kokoro Ikusei Game is a Simulation game, published by TDK Mediactive, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Koi Se yo! Hatsukoi Danshi: Tokimeki Gakuen Love
summary: A Japan only NTT Solmare game.

name: Kokonoe Kokoro
summary: A visual novel/dating sim wherein most of the character are various creatures.

name: Koi Musubi
summary:
After studying away in Taiwan, Shao-Tang finally comes back to his hometown of Nangan to be a receptionist at an inn for the summer
where he works with his childhood friend Zi-Jin. "Without a love knot, you will be single forever!"

name: Kombi Travels: Jigsaw Landscapes
summary: Escape urban life in a sweet Jigsaw Puzzle about Love, Travel and Life. What awaits you when you set the last piece?

summary: Koutetsu no Kishi 3: Gekitotsu Europe Sensen is a Strategy game, developed by Dual and published by Asmik Ace Entertainment, Inc, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: KoboldKroniken
summary: The KoboldKroniken - a unique new world full of exciting adventures. Master the catacombs of Kwertz in the dunegon runner full of puzzles and dangers, collect valuable kokkatts, grow your own umpfs and create your personal goblin avatar.

name: Korean Scary Folk Tales VR : The Forbidden Book
summary: This is a VR escape room game based on a Korean scary folk tale. You will be challenged with your fear and the time is running out but good luck! This game contains some puzzles and we kindly advise you not to spoil other player's fun by leaving the solution to the puzzles when you are leaving your review on this game.

This edition includes the following;

summary: Koushien 3 is a Sports game, developed and published by Magical Company (Mahou), which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Kosmickop
summary: In a post apocalyptic wasteland a jerboa is impersonating a police officer, much to the chagrin of a shadowy evil organisation.

name: Konchuu no Mori no Daibouken
summary: Konchuu no Mori no Daibouken is an Action game, developed and published by Culture Brain, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Kolhii Champions AU
summary: On the great island of Mata Nui, the matoran compete for honor and glory in the great sport of Kolhii! With the copper masks up for grabs, all bets are off in this highly competetive arena. This is where champions are made!

name: Kogarashi
summary: Kogarashi is a 3D Hack N' Slash game on which you control Abura Akago, a fire demon that fights against the evil spirit Yuki Onna and her army of ice demons.

name: Koru
summary: Play as aspiring botanist, Koru, on her journey to Wilder County to start an apprenticeship with the illusive Dr. Linny.

name: Konchuu Monster: Battle Stadium
summary: Konchuu Monster: Battle Stadium is an Action game, developed and published by Culture Brain, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Kommersant
summary: Kommersant is a game that will teach you how to think positively, carve your way to success, and finally sell that friggin vacuum.

name: Kokorogawari Fantasy
summary: Welcome to Kokorogawari's alternate world - Kokorogawari Fantasy! This is a comedic little RPG featuring the main cast of Kokorogawari. It's a great way to have some silly fun after playing through the serious main game!

name: Kota's New Journey
summary: An elven sorceress decides to visit her old friend, but gets caught up in a series of exciting (and slightly lewd) adventures, where she finds new friends, rare spells... and loses her swimsuit.

name: Koi wa Rule ni Shibararenai!
summary:
The protagonist is an ordinary high school girl who goes to Yuurin Secondary High School. Suddenly one day her uncle who is the school's Board Chairman leaves his duties up to her as the next Chairman of the School Board.

The power of the Board Chairman is great, they can change the school rules at any time. However at this school the approval of the Student Council is also needed.

The five members of the Student Council appear in front of the protagonist.
Sometimes fighting against them, sometimes cooperating with them, the protagonist has to overcome various problems while running the school.

It's time to start this year full of troubles!

name: Konami's Baseball
summary: Batter up with Konami's newest sports game, Baseball! Gather your team and hit a homerun!

name: Kotori Love Ex P
summary: Kotori Love Ex P is comprised of three parts: Kotori LOVE (Kotori's stories from D.C.P.C., D.C.W.S., D.C.A.S., and C.D.C.D.), Kotori Extasy! (18+ port of PS2 D.C.I.F.) and Kotori Plus!. The last part is a brand new story focusing on Junichi and Kotori’s life as newly-weds.

name: Kobold Garden
summary: a game

name: Kobito-zukan: Kobito Kansatsu Set
summary: A game for the 3DS from the Kobito Dukan/Dsukan/Zukan series - Explore the garden and help find the 13 kobito hidden throughout!

name: Kommissar
summary:
Kommissar is a political prosecution simulator in a totalitarian regime.  
 
Keep the Independent City-State of Roulettenburg united under the regime iron fist. Watch for your fellow citizens and seize the dissidents for the glory of the fatherland.

name: Kony 2020
summary: Joseph Kony is in deep peril! Will Jessica J. Kellen be able to save him and defeat an inter-dimensional demon that only she can defeat, or will she crumble under the weight of her newfound burden. What even IS Field Hockey? Find out in Kony 2020

name: Kotoba no Puzzle Mojipittan Wii
summary: Kotoba no Puzzle Mojipittan Wii

summary: Koopa Troopa Forest is an unreleased Mario game that was made to showcase how the pointer controls for the Wii would work. The game's existence was unknown until July 2021, when documents about the development of the Wii were leaked as a part of the Gigaleaks.

name: Koikoi
summary:
This boy is not alone.
Because you are with him!

name: K-ON!!: Houkago Rhythm Selection
summary: K-ON!!: Houkago Rhythm Selection is a trading card arcade game released by Sega on November 13, 2014.

summary: Koihime Enbu is an upcoming all-girls 2D fighting game based on the Koihime Musou visual novel, which in turn is based on Romance of the Three Kingdoms.

name: Kong
summary: Kong (also known popularly as "Kong 64") is a Donkey Kong clone for Commodore 64. It is infamous for its bizarre cover art.

name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Kono Yokubukai Game ni Shinpan Wo!: Limited Edition
summary: This edition includes the following PS4 Game: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Kono Yokubukai Game ni Shinpan Wo!, Original Drama CD + Game CD Soundtrack

name: Koutetsu no Kishi
summary: Koutetsu no Kishi is a Strategy game, developed by Dual and published by Asmik Ace Entertainment, Inc, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: Koala Sling
summary: Koala Sling is an arcade mobile-browser game that is playable on the Singpore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: Konami no Uranai Sensation
summary:
This is a collection of four fortune telling mini-games as follows;
- Match making
- Horoscope
- Palm reading
- Rune stones

For this you first need to define some details about yourself and answer some questions, after which you can have your Horoscope, or palm read or the rune stones. For the match making you need to have a second person input their details and have them answer some questions also.

name: Koutei Heika ni Narou!
summary: While our king was visiting his dying teacher, he found and released a girl sealed in a tree. It seems his teacher had sealed her because she came from the underworld. What he released was just her spirit. To get her body back, he has to find medals that his teacher gave to other kings. Well, he has four commanders to help him do that. He can also get some princesses too, if he want to.

name: Kojimachi Island
summary: Kojimachi is a widget style pet game where you can feed and care for your pet on the island you decorate.

name: Kosmo Laika: Space and Beyond
summary: Kosmo Laika: Space and Beyond helps you collect stamps of space exploration and beyond. Learn even more about the most important characters in astronomy, finding the perfect combination of exclusive patches. Earn stickers from interplanetary missions in this mix of puzzle, word game, and trivia!

name: Koi ni, Kanmi o Soete
summary:
My new home is my grandmother’s house that also functions as a café. Due to my grandmother’s recent illness and hospitalization, however, she was forced to close the café until further notice. When I heard about my grandmother’s situation from Chisato Komada (a childhood friend who is like an older sister to me), I looked around the desolate café and my heart was filled with a sense of loneliness. It was then I immediately thought:

“I want to bring the shop back to life again and show it to grandmother…!!!”

We renovated the inside of the shop and gave it a new name. We prepared a new menu and café uniforms and began the hiring process to find new, part-time staff. Right away two girls, Niwasaka Rira and Shionomiya Rishie, came into the cafe.

「“Um… would it be ok if we worked here?”」

An unusually strong breeze blew cherry blossom petals inside the shop and they fluttered and danced around the cafe, myself, and the girls around me. This could only be a premonition of the bittersweet tale that would soon follow…

name: Kong
summary:
A fan-made remake of the classic Game and Watch game Donkey Kong

Kong has stolen your lunch, again. Avoid the barrels and topple the gorilla to retrieve it!

name: Kooky Sphere
summary: Kooky Sphere is a game made for the Dream Diary Jam 5 you explore the dreams of Rose.

name: Kong Fu Legend: God of War
summary: "Kong Fu Legend: God Of War" is a massively multiplayer online game (MMORPG). The game provides players with a lot of different quality equipment, and the pursuit of high-level (or best) equipment is one of the most important goals for players in the game.

name: Kong II
summary: A fan-made remake of the classic Game and Watch game Donkey Kong II.

name: Komadori Inn
summary: Your boring life changed, when you started to work at the Komadori Inn. A picturesque forest by the sea and beautiful co-workers make the perfect place for relaxing.

name: Kotoba no Puzzle Mojipittan Daijiten
summary: Kotoba no Puzzle Mojipittan Daijiten

name: Koi wa Alf Laylah
summary:
There was once a lone princess in a kingdom surrounded by a desert far, far away. She'd simply be beautiful if she kept silent but most of the time she was a tsundere. As if to hide her tender nature deep in her heart, she was a tomboy always doing whatever she wanted. At such a princess' side was her loyal manservant.

Spoiled by and dependent on her servant, the princess lived a peaceful life, free and uncontrolled.
Until one day, her father declared:

"You will marry the prince of our neighboring kingdom."

Unsurprisingly, the princess didn't accept such a sudden declaration of marriage.

"I will never, ever get married!!"

So, this tsundere princess...
Was to meet the prince to arrange their marriage.
And by her side was her loyal servant.

From where will the flower of love bloom...!?

name: Korga's Arena
summary: We combined a Roguelite Deckbuilder, a Turn-Based RPG, and a bloodthirsty orc battle-mage, to create Qrena! Craft your Deck, enhance your Weapons, and forge your Gladiator Emblem to customize your playstyle.

name: Korvae in Space
summary: Solve puzzles and shoot enemies in this fun little indie game.

name: Kozmik Krooz'r
summary: Kozmik Krooz'r is a shoot 'em up video game developed by Bally Midway and released in arcades in 1982. The spaceship, a core element of the gameplay, is not an in-game graphic, but a physical plastic model. A series of mirrors projects the mothership just above the game's monitor.

name: Kotoba no Puzzle: Mojipittan DS
summary: Kotoba no Puzzle: Mojipittan DS

name: Koishi Adventure
summary: Koishi Adventure is a 2D top-down slash-and-shoot Touhou Project doujin RPG, where you'll be adventuring in the absurd and brutal world of Lotusland from the perspective of the Komeiji Koishi~ In the game, you can explore dungeons, collect equipments, and constantly strengthen your party~

name: Kousai Toshi
summary: An upcoming kinetic novel by Key and Matsuyama Takeshi, which tells the story of an investigator in the near future was demoted after becoming entangled in a conspiracy.

name: Kouenji Joshi Soccer 2: Koi wa Nebagiba Kouenji
summary: Kouenji Joshi Soccer 2: Koi wa Nebagiba Kouenji is an Adventure game, developed and published by Starfish SD, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Konami Antiques: MSX Collection Vol. 1
summary:
This game is the first volume of a series of compilations of MSX computer games released by Konami only in Japan. It was also released on the Sega Saturn.

This compilation includes the classic games:

- Konami's Boxing (1984):
A boxing game with a couple of moves, with the standard jabs complimented by body punches and the ability to dodge, duck or raise your guard. Each punch weakens your opponent's strength, although going long enough without being hit can see this begin to recover. A rain of blows can produce a quick knockout, but in general you must hit him many times, and then with a knockout blow, to see him go down. There is a referee. The game has a two player option.

- Konami's Ping-Pong (1985):
From Konami's coin-op, Ping Pong recreates the fast-paced sport of table tennis. To win each match you must get to 10 points with a 2 point lead - if the scores reach 10-9 the game goes on until someone has a 2 point lead or reaches 15, in a similar manner to tennis. There are nine skill levels to beat, with increasing abilities as the game goes on. The human player has the advantage of serving first, and as the serve reverses every five points, you are guaranteed to have more chances to serve than your opponent (remember the significance of 10 and 15 in the scoring). The points system rewards long rallies and large winning margins, as you get points for each hit, for each point won, and for each point of the winning margin.

- Hyper Sports 2 (1985):
Three tough events await in this joystick-waggling action game. The full sequence of events is - skeet shooting, archery and weightlifting. You must complete each event in order to be allowed onto the next one.

- Mopiranger (1985):
The peaceful land of the Mopira have been invaded by the Razons. In this platform game you 'll play Mopiranger and you have to save the young Moplits, who have been kidnapped by the dastardly Razons. The levels are build in a maze-like pattern in which you have to find and rescue the young Moplits from the hostile Razons. Using the obstacles present in the game you can block the Razons, but also lock yourself in...

- Antarctic Adventure (1984):
As a penguin, you must travel around Antarctica, making your way between bases before time runs out. This sounds easy, right? Wrong. Hindering your progress will be ice crevices and leopard seals. You can jump over the crevices, but jumping over the leopard seals may be difficult. You can speed up or slow down the penguin to avoid both of these hazards. The bases include Australia, France, New Zealand, USA, Argentina, UK, and Japan. You can collect flags and eat fish for points. Collecting a flashing flag will allow you to wear a propeller that enable you to fly over those hazards.

- Yie Ar Kung-Fu (1984):
Based on the popular arcade game, Yie Ar Kung-Fu follows Oolong's quest to become a Kung-Fu master. Of course this involves fighting a wide range of opponents in a traditional one-on-one 2D environment. Oolong has a wide range of attacks he can use to lower his opponent's life bar, including traditional punching and kicking attacks as well as jumping ones. Opponents are well armed with unique weapons and attacks, so Oolong's task won't be easy.

- Road Fighter (1985):
A top view racing game. You have to reach the finish line before time runs out. Don't crash into the wall, cars or trucks. Because if you do you will lose gasoline. You can get additional gasoline by picking up fuel items. Especially avoid the purple cars, they do change lanes! And remember... oil makes road slippery...

- Sky Jaguar (1984):
Vertical shooter. When a weakened and vulnerable Earth is invaded by the vicious Zephyr army, the planet's only hope is a fleet of powerful ships, the Sky Jaguars. It 'll take sharp reflexes and amazing skills to survive the Zephyrians' unrelenting assault... can you last long enough to discover and destroy the enemy's hidden headquarters?

- Gradius (1986):
The people of Gradius are in trouble. The ameoboid Bacterions have launched an all out attack against the planet, and it's up to you to fly into battle and save them. Along the way you'll be able to power up your ship with hyper speed, force fields, lasers, missiles, double beam cannons and more to help you battle. Based on the arcade game, Gradius is a side scrolling shooter. Shooting certain enemies will leave a power up pod behind which can be collected to add more power to your ship. Each level features a wide variety of enemies trying to stop you, with a large boss at the end. Gameplay is for one player or two players alternating.

- Gofer no Yabou: Episode 2 (1988):
Also known as Nemesis 3 - The Eye Of Destruction. Gradius 3 is a vertical scrolling shoot 'm up. Shooting at certain enemies will leave a power up pod behind which can be collected to add more power to your space ship (for example special weapons or a force field). Every level features a wide variety of enemies trying to stop you, with a large boss at the end. Gameplay is for one player or two players alternating. In Gradius 3 the planet Gradius is involved in 3 space wars: versus Bacterion, Venom and Salamander!

name: Konami's Golf
summary: Visual simulation just like the real thing! Realistic detail in a true-to-life golf game. Use your golfing skills to get a hole-in-one!

name: Konjiki no Gash Bell!! Go! Go! Mamono Fight!!
summary: Konjiki no Gash Bell!! Go! Go! Mamono Fight!! Konjiki no Gasshu Beru!! Gō! Gō! Mamono Fight!!, "Golden Gash Bell!! Go! Go! Demon Fight!!") is a video game for PlayStation 2 and GameCube which was developed by Eighting and was published by Bandai on December 15, 2005. The fighting gameplay style is similar to Super Smash Bros. with four-player multiplayer, as well as few other video games like Konjiki no Gash Bell!! Unare! Yūjō no Zakeru Dream Tag Tournament.

name: Korona:Nemesis
summary: Korona:Nemesis is a fast-paced physics-based platform fighter that challenges you to counter your opponents' projectiles on the fly and to adapt to the everchanging interactive environments.

name: Koori no Haka Ichiyanagi Nagomu, Sandome no Junan
Kolo Terorita
summary: SiIvaGunner's antivirus has activated, and it wants to the delete the Harlem Shake by force! Play as Ajit Pai and use your weapons to defend the Harlem Shakeover at all costs.

name: K.O. Drive
summary: Back in 2012, Sega unveiled a new combat driving arcade game called KO Drive at the DEAL 2012 trade show in Dubai. Afterwards, the game made an occasional appearance at other trade shows, but ultimately was cancelled. This easy to pick up battle-racing game has been designed with multiplayer action in mind. Tracks include London, Vegas, Shanghai, Toronto, Cairo and Rome.

name: Koko wa Rakuensou
summary: A visual novel from Foster.

name: Kommissar Kugelblitz: Das Geheimnis von Spooky Hill
K-ON! Houkago Live!! HD Ver.
summary: An HD remaster of the PSP game K-On! Houkago Live!! for PS3.

name: Koumajou Densetsu I&II Premium Pack
summary: A fully updated re-release of Scarlet Symphony and Stranger's Requiem with an abridged version of the soundtracks, character artworks, and sprites of the characters and enemies from both games in one package.

name: Koregafuko
summary: Koregafuko is a fantasy visual novel. Immerse yourself in a new world together with an ordinary Japanese schoolboy Naoto and discover all its secrets!

name: Kokoro Ultimate
summary: Defeat Ryzon and tame your inner beast in this hybrid 3D Fighter. Transform into a secondary fighter or activate a unique weapon to extend combos.

name: Kofun ha Ikiteiru: Maholova Club no Shitai Sagashi
Korean Drone Flying Tour Gangneung City
summary: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!

name: Koi Koi Mahjong
summary: Koi Koi Mahjong is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Visco, which was released in Japan in 2000

name: Konami's Soccer
summary: Fast Action-True to Life-Soccer. Be part of KONAMI's winning team!

name: Koala Kids
summary:
Koala Kids is a puzzle-platformer game, in the style of retro games like Lode Runner.
Includes Hot-seat Coop and Level Editor.

name: Korokke! Ban-Ou no Kiki wo Sukue
Kombate Mexicano Elexiones
summary: Kombate Mexicano Elexiones is a fighting game featuring digitized stereotyped character trying to win the presidency of Mexico.

name: Kolibri
summary: Kolibri is a side scrolling shooter, featuring a hummingbird hero acrosss 19 levels in a variety of natural settings, with multiple objectives as solving puzzles, clearing all enemies, or free romaing exploring in any directions.

name: Kontrast
summary: Illustrated puzzle game in which playful investigation is rewarded.

name: Koushien 2
summary: Koushien 2 is a Sports game, developed by Affect and published by K Amusement Leasing, which was released in Japan in 1992.

name: Kotori with a gun
summary: Play as Kotori from Love Live! and shoot people with a gun, hide their bodies in the grave yard behind the shrine and get different endings!

name: Konaste Gitadora
summary:
The home cloud version of the arcade game Gitadora, as part of Konami's Konaste Game Station line of arcade game versions.

The game's theme is based on the game Gitadora Nex+Age, but the song list and progression system are brand new.

name: Konami Collector's Series: Arcade Advanced
summary: Contains emulated ports of Frogger, Time Pilot, Yie Ar Kung-Fu, Gyruss, Scramble, and Rush-N Attack.

name: Koutetsu Yousai Strahl
summary:
The game takes place in modern times where a great depression has swept over the world. Amidst the depression and its riots of jobless workers, a mad scientist starts his plan of world domination. Taking command in the titular fortress orbiting Earth, the evil Doctor Gegeben Funkerun uses his own robots, flying fortresses and mercenaries to wreak havoc across the globe until all his demands are met. Assisting the attacked and weakened governments, workers across the nations help develop a series of jet fighters called the Aizerun Geist to use against the forces of Dr. Funkerun and save the world.

Before each stage begins, players are given a choice of weapons to purchase at a hangar for the Aizerun Geist. There are four weapons within three tiers to choose from including Main Attack, Sub Weapon and Bomb. Of the Main Attack the player can choose Twin Shot, Laser, Heavy Laser and the Charge Shot. Of the Sub Weapons, players can choose additional firepower, Homing Missiles, Shielded Options or an energy barrier. Players can stock up on multiple bombs including Small bombs, rockets, larger bombs or napalm.

The Aizerun Geist provides tactical advantages during combat with the use of its manually directional Sub Weapon. Players are able to direct additional firepower in five directions including vertical and horizontal by pressing the bomb button while firing. The game runs for six stages through various settings such as a jungle, stormy skies, Tokyo and Fortress Strahl itself.

name: Kouryu Densetsu Villgust Gaiden
summary: Kouryu Densetsu Villgust Gaiden is a Role-Playing game, developed by TOSE and published by Angel (Bandai), which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: Kontra
summary: Fast paced shooter features multiplayer zombie mode, surf online, deathrun online, deathmatch online and arms race online. Zombie mode includes different gameplay mechanics: zombie classes and various shop items. Deathrun mode includes knife types and day types.

name: Kool-Aid Man
summary: Help Kool-Aid Man in a battle with the Thirsties! Those insatiable Thirsties are stealing the water out of your swimming pool. You want to catch em when they stop to dip their straws in the pool. Also, help Kool-Aid Man gobble up Kool-Aid ingredients in order to keep the Thirsties from bouncing Kool-Aid Man around the backyard.

name: Korg M01
summary:
The Korg M01 is a new Nintendo DS version of Korg's M1 Workstation that comes courtesy of AQ Interactive.

The M1 was hugely popular in the late '80s and early '90s, and the 8-part multitimbral, 12-note polyphonic DS version will feature all of its PCM data, giving you 300 sounds. There's an 8-track/16-step sequencer, a master effect (either reverb or delay), and various editing windows, while data can be exchanged wirelessly between DSs.

name: Koi no Tsuzuki wa Honeymoon de
summary: A Visual novel by Voltage Inc.

name: Kotodama Diary
summary:
Kotodama Diary is a simple, entertaining game that lets you have fun with bizarre characters that evolve depending on your choices! There are more than 100 different species of these weird characters, known as the "kotodummies".
And, maybe, you'll find that the words you chose tell you something about yourself...

name: Koden Koureijutsu Hyaku Monogatari: Honto ni Atta Kowai Hanashi
Kore VR
summary: Want to learn the Korean alphabet in VR? Hop into Kore VR where you get to learn the alphabet in an interactive orb and shoot away letters in the shooting arena to get ingredients for delicious Korean dishes in 3 minutes! Get those letters right! Otherwise, you will get roasted in Korean!

name: Kofi Quest
summary: Kofi Quest is a not-so-serious adventure that brings together mechanics from Action RPG and RTS games. You’ll control Kofi, a weak, lazy and unlucky videogame character that will be followed by a group of interesting (and pathetic) characters aiding him.

name: Koopa: A Winter's Tale
summary: Koopa: A Winter's Tale is an atmospheric exploration minigame featuring nearly 100% original graphics and backgrounds. Journey through three wintery levels as a Koopa Troopa, just trying to find the stuff needed for a warm winter night.

name: Koncolos
summary: "Do you know a monster that dwells around here?" she asked. An ordinary barkeepers' journey, intertwined with the only survivor from a shrouded monster hunter company, started with this question.

name: KobberParty - Castle Explorer
summary: KobberParty is a fast and exciting dungeon dweller game for up to 9999 players. A dungeon game of wanting to reach just little bit further to get just a little bit richer with the risk of losing everything.

name: Kori DRoP
summary:
Tap to pop the blocks.
Save the little dude from the water.
Eat lots of carrots.
81 levels of fun and frustration.

name: KO Punch
summary: A 1981 boxing game from Sega. It introduced a pressure-sensitive boxing bag controller to measure a player's punching power.

name: Konyok-Gorbunok
summary: Soviet arcade game based on russian fairy tales.

name: Kong Hero
summary: ‘Kong Hero' is a 2D platform jumping game with cartoon style. The player controls a cute little monkey through many difficulties and finally reaches the destination.

name: Kokoronull
summary: "Kokoronull" is a hardcore action game that adds the element of "slipperiness" to the usual platform action gameplay. Conquering all 25 stages is an impressive achievement.

name: Koshka
summary: A game about a black and white Cat and her obsession with color.

name: Kowai Mono ni ha Futa wo Shiro
summary:
Everyone is living covering up something. They pretend not to notice it."

A direct mail from a famous event planning company. It contained a notice of a summer ghost story event called "Hyakumonogatari" and a call for participants.
You, a horror and occult enthusiast, decided to go to the event by yourself.
There, you meet a childhood friend you haven't seen in 10 years and also your current best friend (?). You were happy to meet them so unexpectedly, however......
The lid of your memory is lifted as you are led through a "scary story. What will become of them, tossed about and confused by the past and the present?

name: Konamic Tennis
summary: Real tennis rallying, with fierce serves, powerful smashes and fast volleys! This is the real thing!! Three challenging styles of play; Play a singles game against the computer, two players can play singles against each other, or they can play doubles against the computer!

name: Koushinchou Shoujo: XL na Kanojo ha H na Nayami de Ippai!
summary: A visual novel from Shironyan.

name: Kokuga
summary: A top down co-op shooter from the studio behind Ikaruga. Kokuga uses a similar polarity mechanic with two colors of enemy shots that must be avoided by switching to the proper color. Players control a mech that must be moved throughout a grid based level and finish the boss of the level to move on.

name: Koikatsu
summary: A school simulator developed by Illusion. You are the sole male student on this former girl's academy, and have the mission to show love to all of your colleagues.

name: Koi suru Kanojo no Bukiyou na Butai
Kosmos Connections
summary: Three girls, one game. Will you be able to solve the mystery of the world of Kosmos and Uplink Alethia, or will you live out your days blind to the truth?

name: Kour.io
summary: Kour.io is thee ultimate first-person multiplayer 3D web shooter experience that will plunge you into heart-pounding battles across so many different maps and alongside a multitude of guns and modes to play with! Kour.io is one of the easiest accessible first-person shooter games due to it being available on both your web browser, and mobile. It possesses numerous game modes ranging from free for all, team deathmatch, gun-game, and Hardpoint! You have the option to select from a variety of classes from AK-47's to Flamethrowers that fit your playstyle to help you ensure you become the #1 Kourian!

name: KORG DSN-12
summary: KORG DSN-12 software makes it easy for anyone to enjoy serious sound-creation and song production with analogue synthesisers.

name: Koala Quest: Parenthood Prevention
summary:
Koala recently got knocked up, but she's not at all enthused about giving birth and raising a kid. It's up to her and her neighbors to find the herbs necessary to end pregnancy.

Action! Diplomacy! Adventure! Elemento! This multi-genre game has it all! Or maybe just those four things.

name: Koushien: Konpeki no Sora
summary: The final game in the Koushien series

name: Kotoba no Kieta Hi ~Kokoro made Hadaka ni Suru Jun'ai Choukyou~
summary: An erotic visual novel starring a protagonist who can read minds. Use this power to engage in a wide variety of sexual acts centered around the concept of "consensual abnormal play," where you and your partner push the limits of eroticism.

name: Koe de Asobou! HeartCatch PreCure!
summary: A game in which you can watch video clips from the Heartcatch PreCure! anime, record your own voices for each of the characters, add sound effects, and watch/listen to the results.

name: Konneko
summary: An adult visual novel.

name: Kojouji
summary: Kojouji is a sci-fi survival-horror puzle game that takes place in an abandoned factory.

name: Konae-chan no Doki-doki Penguin Kazoku
summary:
Konae-chan no DokiDoki Pengin Kazoku (KONAEちゃんのドキドキペンギン家族) is a Downloadable Event Game developed by Pax Softnica for the Satellaview. It stars Konae and was distributed as a tie in to the Radio Program "If Tomorrow Comes...".
The premise of BS Konae-Chan no DokiDoki Pengin Kazoku is to cross a freezing body of water by jumping across rows of glaciers without falling into the water. Points are awarded based on the number of penguins collected.

name: K.O.: The Pro Boxing
summary: Supervised by JBC (Japan Boxing Association). The boxing life is beautifully reproduced in the game. Steady practice is a training simulation, and the game is a real-time action that actually operates the trained boxer. You can create and select your favorite boxer, and there are countless boxer creation patterns such as height, class, and face. It's up to the player to take advantage of their abilities and to train to reinforce their weaknesses. Not only the basic movements of boxing, but also the special moves unique to the game are hidden.

name: Kooring VR Coding Adventure
summary: Let’s ride the Blockstar and go on a journey to the Coding World. Help Kooring catch the troubled Tooring in the beautiful Block World! Having fun playing block coding fosters logical thinking and creativity. The Highest Level of Immersion Brings The Highest Learning Effect!

name: Konami GB Collection Vol. 2
summary:
The Konami GB Collection is a series of video game compilations for the Game Boy Color. The compilations were originally released from 1997 to 1998 in Japan for Game Boy, and were later released in Europe in 2000 for Game Boy Color.

Included in Volume 2:
- Parodius
- Block Game (Quarth)
- Track & Field
- Frogger

This was released as Volume 4 in Japan.

name: Kogent Defender
summary: Kogent Defender enlists you to protect your home world from an encroaching enemy known as the Virtera. Under the command of the Kogent Mind you will take on this alien infestation and work to eliminate it completely.

name: Kotomasho: I Can't Believe This Neet Guy Turned Into a Magical Girl!
summary: A Gameboy Color and Anime inspired adventure game with RPG elements. The protagonist is a neet 21 year old guy who suddenly acquires the Power of Dreams and transforms into a Magical Girl.

name: Konohana 2: Todokanai Requiem
summary: Konohana 2: Todokanai Requiem is the second entry of the mystery visual novel series Konohana, after the infamous Grim Reaper murder mystery case, Meguru Momoi gained some recognition and everything seemed back to normal until one morning when he and his partner, Miako Tachibana, arrived on the school only to see police cordoning the area of what appears to be a new murder case.

name: Koufuku wo Yobu Game: Dora Dora Dora
summary: Koufuku wo Yobu Game: Dora Dora Dora is a Mahjong video game released on the Nintendo Famicom in 1991. This game allows you to play traditional Mahjong games against a computer or to play an RPG adventure in which you fight enemies by playing rounds of Mahjong.

name: Koguma-Chan no Daibouken
summary: Koguma-Chan no Daibouken is an educational game divided into different mini games that are about using rock, scissors and paper, escape a mine, fishing, choose the right flower, choose the right tree, etc.

name: Koi Hai Tunnel
summary:
The main character, Kudao, was invited by childhood friends Sazane and Tamao. They travel to an abandoned tunnel, rumored to be haunted.

An unexpected situation occurs in the tunnel...?

name: Kosmos: The Discovery of Nature
summary: Kosmos is a first-person exploration adventure in which you set sail on the vast ocean to discover the wilderness of nature. Make use of the natural resources of the tropical jungle and meet a variety of wildlife on your journey of taking photographs of the wonders of the world.

name: Konon: Zew Choroszczy
summary: A game about Konon, his arch-enemies, his missing friend, parcels with God's surprises and out-of-date ones (with peasant or children's inserts). Go in search of your nitro friend, fight your opponents, collect collectibles and unleash a mighty bang!

name: Kona & Snowrabbit
summary: Kona, an ice artist with a reputation for mischief, and Snowrabbit, a white-furred snow rabbit full of desire. After hearing the story of Aquus, the mermaid goddess, the two down-on-their-luck artists break into the monastery of Aquus, nicknamed "the sea on land," to make a statue of a goddess.

name: Kotoba no Puzzle: Mojipittan Advance
summary: Kotoba no Puzzle Mojipittan Advance is a GBA puzzle game.

name: Konami Kids Playground: Frogger Hop, Skip & Jumpin' Fun
summary: Edutainment game that teaches kids the value of exercise with the help of the classic arcade character, Frogger.

name: Korgan
summary:
Korgan is an episodic dungeon-crawler game. 
 
While playing the story mode you can switch your character in real time to face different kind of enemies or obstacles. 
 
Combine their abilities: freeze an enemy with the Mage, switch your character to Warrior and finish him with brute force, or perhaps shoot him from a safe range with the Hunter? Each character have their own abilities, strengths and weakness.

name: Kosmonaut
summary: Kosmonaut is the original idea behind the game Skyroads. In this game you control a hovercraft, flying over an obstacle different platforms on which you must avoid falling off and gaping holes. Flying over certain platforms can increase your abilities and give special powerups, or kill you. The game features a high score list unlike Skyroads.

name: Korobo
summary: Korobo is an action adventure game that follows the story of a pint-sized robot named “Korobo” and his owner, Tom, a young boy who receives Korobo as a gift from his father on his 10th birthday. Players step into the tiny but mighty shoes of Korobo, embarking on a thrilling and heartfelt journey.

name: Kotoko-chan is 'different'.
summary:
Diligent and shy Kotoko Haruyama has a lot of expectations riding on her.
Burdened by stress, she develops a strange habit.

That is, whenever she realizes someone is looking at her lewdly, she reciprocates just a little, somewhat erotically...

But her strange little habit gets bolder and bolder and...
she eventually falls prey to the ploys of perverted men...

name: Koppotate's Rescue Mission 2: The Path to Eradication
summary: Join Koppotate, Ruby and A.J. on a journey to save Koppai from a terrible pandemic. Explore lush environments and brand-new custom story mode maps as you progress towards the eradication of this virus!

name: Kono Uta ga Owattara: When This Song Is Over
Kojin Kyouju: La Lecon Particuliere
summary: A dating simulation game released in 1998 by Mycom.

name: Konjiki no Gash Bell!! Makai no Bookmark
summary: Konjiki no Gash Bell!! Makai no Bookmark is an anime-based role-playing adventure.

name: Korwin the Game
summary:
Old-school 2D platform game.

You play as a warrior for freedom in the fight against hordes of socialists.

19 models enemies. 12 levels.

name: Konoha Challenge
summary: Main heroine is homunculus created by Mad Alchemist. She is implanted memory of younger sister. She exists via sexual energy and needs daily masturbation to survive. If she resists this urge, her body gets more and more aroused. Her bright school life begins!

name: Kodomo Chousadan Mighty Pockets
summary:
Kodomo Chousadan Mighty Pockets is a downloadable 3-part Soundlink game for the Satellaview that was broadcast in at least 2 runs between September 7, 1997 and March 28, 1998.

The game plays like a board game with a detective motif similar to the game of Clue/Cluedo. The rules of the game however, are considerably different. Throughout the game, SoundLink narration is used; including rapping over Michael Jackson sound samples and remixes of 1950s American Television.

name: Kokeshi: The Secret of the Cicada's Nest
summary: The player will fight and explore the world as a unique warrior composed of three heroes. Ko, Ke, and Shi have united, combining three primary martial arts disciplines: attack, defense, and long-range attack. However, at any given moment, only one of them can be active.

name: Koutetsu no Kishi 2: Sabaku no Rommel Gundan
summary: Koutetsu no Kishi 2 is a Strategy game, developed by Dual and published by Asmik Ace Entertainment, Inc, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Koewotayorini: Last Game
summary: Koewotayorini: Last Game is an adventure game. The goal of the game is to escape 2000 passengers on the ship.

name: Koshien Pocket
summary: Koshien Pocket is a Japanese baseball game for the Game Boy Color.

name: Kottabos VR
summary: This is a VR trip into the ancient world - playing Kottabos, the all-time favorite Greek party game. Prove your skill by throwing the dregs of wine from your cup at the metal disk on the pole in front of you, or fling your drops at the little cups floating in a bowl.

name: Kobo Deluxe
summary: Kobo Deluxe is an enhanced version of Akira Higuchi's game XKobo for Un*x systems with X11. Kobo Deluxe adds sound, smoother animation, high resolution support, OpenGL acceleration (optional), an intuitive menu driven user interface, joystick support and other features. Recent versions also add a number of alternative skill levels with slightly modernized gameplay. Kobo Deluxe uses SDL for graphics, sound and input, which makes it possible to build and run the game on pretty much anything.

name: Korsakovia
summary: Korsakovia is a single-player mod for Valve's video game Half-Life 2. It was developed by The Chinese Room. Korsakovia was released as freeware download on 20 September 2009.

name: Korlax Escape!
summary: Take control of a quirky UFO as Korlax and take on the challenges in this adventurous 3D Side-scroller through multiple levels! You must Escape!

name: Kou Dai Guai Shou II
summary: A NES demake for the GBA game Pokémon Sapphire Version. This game is the second installment of a triple pack of games, covering the content from the fourth gym to Team Aqua's Hideout in Lilycove City.

name: Koko
summary:
Seiichi, a boy who has always lived near a forest in the middle of a small town, grew up hearing stories of monsters and fairies. When the time came to start a new life, he moved to the city, unlucky enough to get lost in one of those areas inhabited by non-human beings. Will he get out of there? Or what decision will he make?

"Her fingers looked like little spider legs on my clothes."

name: Konami Classics Vol. 1
summary: This is a compilation of three Xbox Live Arcade titles on one disc. It includes Castlevania: Symphony of the Night, Frogger, and Super Contra.

name: Koi Land
summary: "Koi Land" is a highly relaxing idle game. Purchase various types of koi fry, raise them over time, and sell them to earn money! Unlock multiple varieties of koi, listen to soothing music, and enjoy the sight of colorful koi as they accompany you through pleasant times!

name: Kore ga Pro Yakyuu '90
summary:
A baseball game for the PC Engine that features athletes and teams from the 1990 Nippon Professional Baseball league. 
 
Kore ga Pro Yakyuu '90 ("This is Pro Baseball '90") is a PC Engine exclusive baseball game and the sequel to Kore ga Pro Yakyuu '89. It did not see a sequel. It features twelve teams and their players from the official Nippon Professional Baseball organization. 
 
Kore ga Pro Yakyuu '90 is a traditional 16-bit baseball game. The camera is positioned behind the batter, with cutaways showing other players on the bases. The pitching player can also use this view to change the formation of their fielders before the next pitch. Once the ball connects with the bat, the view switches to a distant top-down view so that the player can manage their fielders.

name: Konami Kids Playground: Alphabet Circus
summary: Edutainment title that teaches kids about letters and basic spelling.

name: Kombo King
summary: In this Kung Fu beat em' up, you will unleash powerful combos and destructive finishing moves! You are a rogue warrior who vows to avenge his brethren from the Sunless.

name: Korogashi Puzzle Katamari Damacy
summary: Korogashi Puzzle Katamari Damacy is a falling block puzzle video game released by Namco Bandai for the Nintendo DSi's DSiWare digital download service for 500 points (5 dollars). It is a spin-off of the Katamari series. However, it bears little resemblance to the series, resembling Tetris more so. It uses the gameplay engine and concept of Pac-Attack, another puzzle game created by Namco.

name: Konami's Boxing
summary: Go the distance! Battle your way to the world heavyweight boxing championship!!

name: Koronis Rift
summary:
You play as a techno scavenger in the year 2049, exploring the Koronis Rift, in one of Lucasfilms earliest games.

The Ancients abandoned the planet, leaving behind many different artifacts and ships, which you can loot. Send your droid to retrieve modules and try to figure out what the ancient technology is for. It could be batteries, shields or even weapons, to help you fight the trigger-happy saucers that want you dead.

name: KonoSuba: God's Blessing on this Wonderful World!: The Bikini Bundle
Koushien V
summary: Koshien Five Baseball is a 3D baseball game with different game modes that includes vs and story mode and is the first game in the Koshien baseball series for the Playstation One console that also still continues in the Playstation 2 console with their 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003 & 2004 games.

name: Koi Dojo
summary:
Koi Dojo - a game that turns water conservation into a fun-filled adventure. Race against the odds to protect our precious freshwater resources.

Join the community of eco-conscious gamers, and make a splash in mobile gaming while championing a crucial cause. Let's prove that protecting our planet's freshwater can be both fun and rewarding. Dive into a refreshing gaming experience that's making waves in eco-awareness!

name: Komora: Real World Escape
summary: Vtuber「オシャレになりたい！ピーナッツくん」のキャラクター達が繰り広げる ACTRTSゲーム

name: Koboo: The Tree Spirit
summary: An action rogue-lite platformer with strategy and RPG elements. Play as a tree spirit named 'Koboo' as you befriend animals and protect the ancient forest against hunters and an ever expanding industry seeking to destroy it.

name: Koroshi no Dress
summary: Best friend's fiancé is found dead and naked at the park's toilet. Hero starts an investigation, but then the second murder occurs and his girlfriend disappears mysteriously.

name: Kosaka-san.
summary: After an unpleasant incident, the unnamed high-school student protagonist finds himself unable to make friends with most of his classmates. To escape the bustle of lunch time, he goes to the school rooftop. However, one day he finds there a girl who tells him a meteorite is about to hit Earth and wipe humanity, and that she wants to commit suicide before that happens.

name: Konjiki no Gash Bell!!: Friends of Eternal Bonds
summary: A gacha RPG mobile game based around the Konjiki No Gash Bell/Zatch Bell anime.

name: Konpeki no Kantai
summary: Konpeki no Kantai is a Strategy game, developed by Access and published by Angel (Bandai), which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Korokoro Harley
summary:
The world's most "edgy" action game has arrived!
The hedgehog "Harley" who rolls and puts out a needle, unfolds a great adventure!

name: Konami Game Collection Vol. 2
summary:
This is the second of five Konami's Game Collections released on a 3.5" diskette. Volume 2 has the following MSX-1 games:
- Konami's Boxing
- Konami's Tennis
- Video Hustler (Billiards)
- Hyper Olympic 1 (Track & Field 1)
- Hyper Sports 2

These collections where only ever released in Japan, and as such the menu to select the game is in Japanese. But the actual games will display the same as the original releases.

Compared to the original releases, these games have enhanced SCC+ music, when used with the 'SCC+ Sound Cartridge' from the Konami game 'Snatcher' or 'SD Snatcher'.

name: Kojum
summary: A football and martial arts mashup. Local multiplayer featuring 1v1 to 4v4 matches.

name: Kost
summary: KOST is an action adventure RPG game. In the near future, the intelligent system "KOST" will gradually dominate the world. Human consciousness can be transferred to machine generated human chips, and robots can be operated to achieve rebirth. In cruel world, the dark struggle will eventually erupt.

name: Koitsugi: Legend of the Water Guardian
summary: Play as Kaida, a koi who is reluctantly thrown in to save, not just her pond, but the entire river from a poison that turns the habitants into raged filled monsters. In this story driven action-adventure you will slug it out with some of these river dwellers, friend and foe, to save your home!

name: Korean Rail Driving Tour: LRT Busan-Gimhae
summary: This game is a railroad simulation game that allows you to experience actual railroad operation based on 1080p, 60 frame video footage of the driving direction of an actual train. Get feeling of being a train driver just by operating the accelerator and brakes. Enjoy S.Korea’s beautiful scenery!

name: Kokuriko
summary: Kokuriko, Wake up. The boy doesn't care, everything is gray to him. until he accidentally shreds a book, which he finds interesting but more guilty, trying to fix it back piece by piece... unraveling the big picture from the messy details. a short Cinematic, Slice-of-life, puzzle game.

name: Kobold Underground Agency
summary: The Kobolds need your help! Explore the frontiers of this underground world using physics based vehicles that you design yourself. Bring a friend and play in split-screen. What will you discover together?

name: Koihana Bakumeiroku
summary: Koihana Bakumeiroku is a romance game developed by CYBIRD x Animate co-production. It is the first title under the new brand +ONE by Ikémen Series.

name: Kohan: Immortal Sovereigns
summary: A real-time strategy game set in a fantasy world where you take on the role of an immortal known as the Kohan. Your race once ruled the world but was devastated in a series of massive cataclysms. As an immortal, you have reawakened to a new world unlike the one you once knew. Now you must come to grips with your past glory, your present hardship, and your future destiny. If you are to return your race to their rightful glory, you must solve the mystery of their destruction.

name: Kohan II: Kings of War
summary: A real-time strategy game continuing the story of the fantasy world of Khaldun. Even as the world erupts in civil war, an ancient evil gives out a call, and the Shadow-touched begin to gather.

name: Kong: King of Atlantis
summary:
Kong: King of Atlantis is based closely on the companion movie to Kong: The Animated Series, incorporating the plot of the video version in an action-packed, side-scrolling adventure.

When an ancient prophecy starts to come true, the sunken city of Atlantis begins to rise. The evil Queen Reptilla plans to trick Kong into becoming her King, using him as her slave to unite the warring clans of Atlantis for her own evil gains. In a race against time, Jason must convince Kong that Queen Reptilla is evil, in the hope that together they can save the islands of Kong and Atlantis and their inhabitants.

name: Kowloon Youma Gakuen Ki re:charge
summary:
An enhanced version released 2 years after the original game.
This version was also included in the Atlus Best collection of re-releases on the PlayStation 2 in 2008.

name: Kono Bushitsu ha Kitaku Shinai-bu ga Senkyo Shimashita: Portable - Gakuen Dog Year-hen
summary: PSP visual novel released in 2012

name: Kosmonavtes: Escape Reality
summary: A Room Escape and puzzle / adventure game! Help Vala fulfil her dream and become an astronaut!

name: Koi DX
summary:
KOI reflects a tranquil and mesmerizing experience as you embark on an introspective journey through the lens of a lone koi fish separated from its owner and is the last hope for purifying waters polluted by mankind. It’s up to you to turn the tide and guide the koi through eight artfully rendered stages that will take you into the murky as well as enchanting waters, deep below the surface.Search and activate the hiding small fish, bring the small fish to open the flowers with the same color.The wandering black fish should be avoided once encountered.Once all flowers are opened, the black fish will be purified.

Other features:

Memory jigsaws
The memory jigsaws are spread in each of the levels. When picked up, the story of the corresponding level will unlock and can be viewed here.

Skins
The little fish is not alone but with other companions there. Unlock the alternative characters to enjoy a different experience.

name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Jeju Island-1
summary: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!

name: Kodoku no Yurikago
summary:
"That day..."
It's been a year since July 22, but the trauma still haunts me.
Mio died, Kazuha disappeared.
And I was left all alone to continue my dismal existence in a murky, hazy world.
But then, out of nowhere, Mio, whom I thought dead, reappeared before me.
She introduced herself as a transfer student. Apparently, she wasn't the Mio I knew, just a stranger who looked a great deal like her.
Now, tell me, do coincidences like this usually happen?

name: Kowai Shashin: Shinrei Shashin Kitan
summary:
Kowai Shashin is a horror game released for the Sony Playstation in 2002, it is vagyuely similar to the Fatal Frame series.
Gameplay consists of finding a spirit in a creepy photograph, and catching it trough a quick time event.
There´s an urban legend around the game, considering it a cursed one, because of supposed deaths and hauntings during the development (which isn't true, at least, no one died during the making of the game).

name: Konkwest
summary: Konkwest is a globe based, arcade grand strategy game. In one evening, you (and your friends) can play through a world conquest campaign. Many historical starting scenarios bring you into the game world and let you bring your empire to glory. The single-resource economy lets the game appeal to casual players too.

name: KoiGig: Devil x Angel
summary: KoiGig: Devil x Angel is an otome game, developed and published by TwoFive, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Kodai Ouja Kyouryuu King D-Kids Adventure: Dino Slash! Kyouryuu Battle!!
Kotonoha Lernado
summary: Let us exchange the KOTONOHA of hope a little more. *Ĉu vi volas paroli la lingvon "Juliamo"?* Do you want to speak *Juliamo*?

name: Konsui Fighter
summary:
Crash! That was last thing Professor Ayumu Tsuburaya heard before waking up in the hospital. While in a coma, he struggles to remember what led to his condition. Searching his psyche for answers, the beings that make up the fabric of his personality begin to emerge, locked in conflict.

Konsui Fighter is a hand-drawn animated fighting game. The game features 10 playable characters, online/local multiplayer, arcade mode, character tutorials, and an in-depth story mode where players can embark on Ayumu's journey and fight to regain his lost memories.

As the Tournament of the Mind begins, will Ayumu's mind regain order, or will it remain forever lost in chaos?

name: Kobayashi Maru: Final
summary:
An Atari Jaguar CD homebrew game that is heavily inspired by Konami's arcade game Time Pilot. Kobayashi Maru is a 50/60 fps rotary action shooter for the Atari Jaguar games console and was written utilising a version of RAPTOR API by Reboot. It can be played with either a rotary controller (such as Chaos Reins, Tyrant or Jonathan Ascough pad) or a regular Jaguar joypad.

Xu’s United Nations Tetrad are under simultaneous attack from The Ebil Alliance. All that stands between TEA and the XUNTS is you and your warpships. You are the only officer capable of piloting these ships and are therefore the last hope of all XUNT-kind.

As your prototype warpships do not come fitted with stabilising or reverse thrusters, your ship tears around the upper atmosphere with regular engines at full output. Your task is to steer the warpship, avoid collisions and kill the attacking drones. Once the required number of drones have been dispatched, their mothership will arrive and attempt to seek revenge. Defeat this mothership and you’ll charge your warp engines and be off to the next planet where you’ll find new drones are on the attack.

Some drones have taken your fellow XUNTs hostage – you are able to rescue these falling hostages by catching them with your ship, but beware – if you destroy their baloonachutes they’ll fall much more quickly. Chain hostage rescues for increased bonuses, lose a warpship and the chain will reset.

As you defeat drones, your allies below collect their wreckage, recycle it and construct further warpships for your use. 1st extra warpship at 20,000 and every 50,000 afterwards. Lose a warpship and your allies will transport a new one to your position. TEA wins when you no longer have any warpships to replace your damaged vessel.

name: Koneko Monogatari: The Adventures of Chatran
summary: The story of two animals and their adventures. Chatran, the cat, and Pocky, the dog, are two animals who grew up together on the same farm. One day, the two are separated and begin a journey to find each other. The adventurous, and often perilous quest finds the two animals traveling across mountains, plains, and snow-covered lands searching for one another.

name: Korunu Kopia: Fushigi no Sumu Machi
summary: A visual novel by Amateru and Sous le Pawlowina. Kouta is in a train station in France when he sees Rin, a ditsy kirin, and her brother Hati, a fenrir. Rin then eats her train ticket. All three are headed to Cornu Copia, the city where miraculous creatures live. The game is playable in Chinese and Japanese.

name: Konjiki no Gash Bell!! Golden Memories
summary: A Konjiki No Gash Bell (Zatch Bell) mobile card battle game.

name: Kotoba no Puzzle: Mojipittan Encore
summary:
A new entry in the Japanese word puzzle game series started in 2001 with the arcade game Mojipittan, もじぴったん.
It has been over 10 years since the last release in the series

This version is based on Mojipittan Wii Deluxe, released in 2008, with more levels added, bring the total to over 800.
The game's dictionary has also been updated with new words for more options in-game.

name: Korg M01D
summary: The Korg M01D is a music workstation based on the KORG M1, the world’s first widely known synthesiser.

name: Koko Adventure
summary: Koko Adventure is a Famicom platform game developed by Open Corp. in 1993. It is one of the few games for the Famicom that was developed in South Korea. This game was better well-known as its unreleased, American version known as Buzz & Waldog.

name: Konami Game Collection Bangai-hen
summary:
This is the fifth of five Konami's Game Collections released on a 3.5" diskette. This Extra edition has the following MSX-1 games:
- Pippols
- Hyper Rally
- Road Fighter

These collections where only ever released in Japan, and as such the menu to select the game is in Japanese. But the actual games will display the same as the original releases.

Compared to the original releases, these games have enhanced SCC+ music, when used with the 'SCC+ Sound Cartridge' from the Konami game 'Snatcher' or 'SD Snatcher'.

In addition this Extra edition has some unique MSX-2 mini games;

Single Player Games:
- Tsururin Kun (steal rice balls)
- Hyper Somen (catch rice)

Party Games:
- Title Awase (Memory game)
- Go Board

name: Konami Game Collection Vol. 4
summary:
This is the fourth of five Konami's Game Collections released on a 3.5" diskette. Volume 4 has the following MSX-1 games:
- Konami's Soccer
- Konami's Ping Pong
- Konami's Golf
- Hyper Olympic 2 (Track & Field 2)
- Hyper Sports 3

These collections where only ever released in Japan, and as such the menu to select the game is in Japanese. But the actual games will display the same as the original releases.

Compared to the original releases, these games have enhanced SCC+ music, when used with the 'SCC+ Sound Cartridge' from the Konami game 'Snatcher' or 'SD Snatcher'.

name: Koueki Zaidan Houjin Nippon Kanji Nouryoku Kentei Kyoukai Kanken Training
summary: A kanji education game.

name: Kouenji Joshi Soccer 3: Koisuru Eleven Itsuka ha Heaven
Kor
summary: A narrative driven turn based rpg inspired by classic JRPGs

name: Kouryuu Densetsu Villgust: Kieta Shoujo
summary: A fantasy RPG for the Super Famicom. Notable for allowing up to five party members in combat and breaks the usual 9999 limit for health. Never released outside of Japan, but fan translations exist.

name: Kochu's Dream
summary: While taking a nap, you were transformed into a beetle! Explore a sprawling garden from the perspective of a critter. Run, jump, climb and shoot as you chase a mischievous fairy.

name: Kokoro no Pro
summary: A pro wrestling-themed visual novel!

name: Koodbool
summary: Neo L.A.: the distant future of 2024. Retired for eons since a series of legal disputes, Duke Nukem is off to a literal fresh start, festively spending Christmas eve alone, homeless and panhandling.

name: Kosmo Skirmish
summary: Kosmo Skirmish is a multiplayer space combat game. Choose your appearance and your arsenal of 4 weapons and tools to destroy your opponents, alone or as part of a team. Up to 8 players online and/or local!

name: KongQuest
summary: DK64 KongQuest is a first of its kind hack for DK64. By modifying the level’s setup files (for object placement within levels) in the Rom, and stitching them together with some assembly code, this is a linear hack with 5 levels.

name: Kodokuhime
summary:
Himiko's been a wallflower her whole life- so plain and quiet that even the spirits around her never take an interest. But a chance encounter on her way to school might just be the thing to thrust her into the forefront of her very own story.

With black-and-white styling and comic-inspired presentation, Kodukuhime aims to emulate the feeling of a classic shonen manga- full of humor, action, and drama. Framed as the "first chapter" of what would go on to be a weekly series, it can be played through in a single 20-30 minute session.

name: Kokoro Talkers
summary: A boy with amnesia and a girl with the power of "Monomane" allowing her to possess "objects." Talk to everything within the abandoned school—from keypads to computers—to reclaim lost memories and restore the future!

name: Kobold Siege
summary:
Kobold Siege is a short run'n'gun metroidvania with a unique style!

It was originally made for the Newgrounds Egg Jam but i didn't end up finishing it on time, so i decided to make it bigger! I think it was really worth it, i really like how it turned out :)

name: Koi wa Mofumofu! Love Me Teddy
KovaaK 2.0: Tracking Trainer
summary: Designed by KovaaK himself, this guided trainer will help you quickly perfect your target tracking. Featuring five core skills, each with five difficulty levels and a rank system to track your progress. Simple and insightful charts help you isolate problem areas. See how highly you can rank!

name: Komocchi
summary: Raise a cute cartoon avatar, playing mini-games to increase its skills.

name: Kotsuniku no Scotra: Shain Satsu Sasaki Jigoku
summary: Keep your workers focused!

name: Konami GB Collection Vol. 1
summary:
The Konami GB Collection is a series of video game compilations for the Game Boy Color. The compilations were originally released from 1997 to 1998 in Japan for Game Boy, and were later released in Europe in 2000 for Game Boy Color.

Included in Volume 1:
- Gradius (Nemesis)
- Castlevania: The Adventure
- Konami Racing (World Circuit Series)
- Probotector (Operation C)

Despite using the localized title Probotector, which was used for multiple Contra games in Europe, it does not feature robot characters as were used in those localizations.

name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Noroi no Ibutsu to Madoishi Boukensha-tachi
summary: This new Konosuba game is going to be a sequel of the dungeon-crawling JRPG Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Kibou no Meikyuu to Tsudoishi Boukenshatachi, originally released in 2019 for PS4 and PS Vita.

name: Korea: Forgotten Conflict
summary: A stealth game based on the Commandos gameplay style of interdependent characters solving puzzles based mainly on stealth. The player receives a number of commandos each mission and they have some special abilities (medic, sniper, engineer, spy and assassin), with the main gameplay focusing on inventory management and basic combat. Stealth is rudimentary and doesn't affect the mission beyond enemies trying to attack the player's units

name: Konung 1 + 2
summary:
Konung 1 + 2 includes Konung: Legend of the North and Konung 2: Blood of Titans

The world of Konung is a unique and spacious fantasy land, that combines parts of known history with classical myths and the legends of the Chronicles, including immortal heroes, magical artefacts and ancient sorcery. The whole world is shaped by three cultures on the verge of the second millennium: tribes of wild Slavic hunters, noble traders of the still-powerful Byzantine Empire, and fearless Viking warriors.

name: Kokoro: Baka-Monogatari
summary: In Kokoro: Baka-Monogatari you take on the role of Player Tuu, the newest student at the all-girls Sakura Blossom Academy. Join her on her quest to find love among her colorful classmates. (That may be harder than she thinks.) Tuu's bizarre adventure will bring her face-to-face with the Yakuza, telekinetic space aliens, and the most terrifying thing of all... meaningful interpersonal relationships.

name: Korean Political Fighters: 2ND
summary: Korean Political Figures: 2ND is a fighting game featuring a Korean politician who inherited a mobile game of the same name. Choose the politician you support and be reborn as the strongest.

name: Konike
summary: Konike is a turn-based strategy RPG about hunting ghosts for money. Play as a man down on his luck as he uses probability-powered Finder devices to locate invisible spirits in rural America. Use both your skill and intuition to survive, all while uncovering the mystery of your own past and future.

name: Koa: A Gluttonous Wizard
summary: A wonky wizard, slave of his past, has decided to redeem himself and face one of his worst sins: Gluttony. Fight monsters and creatures created by your own fear, overcome darkness in this tiny and quirky adventure full of fantasy, mystery and a lot of bitter sweet challenges.

name: Kori's Fable Visual Novel
summary: In a world of twisted magic and broken spirits be a girl with a mission.
